name: h3
description: The Louisville Slugger Atlas Drop 10 USSSA Baseball Bat is a top choice for players seeking a balanced swing feel. Featuring a one-piece alloy construction, this bat boasts a 2 3/4 inch barrel diameter crafted from SL Hyper Superlight Alloy for maximum pop. The XPND End Cap technology expands the sweet spot, enhancing performance and feel with every hit. Designed in a striking white, black, and teal colorway, the bat also includes a Premium LS Pro Comfort Grip, providing increased tack and cushion for superior control and feel. Certified by USSSA, the Atlas series is engineered for players who demand excellence on the field.
